| HistoryText             = The Mad Cape were a gang that wanted guns for a gang war and purchased a number of weapons from a gun dealer. Who had been payed by their rivals to sell them defective guns. The members who bought the guns, tried to use them on the [[Power Pack (Earth-616)|Power Pack kids]] who were trying to put a stop to the illegal gun sale. Due to the guns being defective they exploded, wounding or killed them.{{r|Power Pack Vol 1 41}}
